# currentImage

**Instance Property**

The current state of the drawing context, expressed as an object that manages image data in your app.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentImage: UIImage { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to access the current Core Graphics context as a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImage] object while providing drawing instructions for one of the drawing methods in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsImageRenderer].
title: currentImage
